item.title: WhaleWord
item.description:
• An Android App that recites GRE vocabulary.

  • It helps the customers manage words and scientifically makes a study plan according to The Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve.

  • It is a coursework for Human-Computer Interaction Systems. And I completed the part of making the study plans.

item.title: IPNET
item.description:
• A platform for patent trading based on blockchain.
  • It provides services including patent trade, patent loan and insurance and patent automated evaluation.
  • It is a competition project. The group of the project consists of 23 people and I am the product manager, who is responsible for the requirement design and the development of blockchain structure.

item.title: UTag
item.description:
• A platform for data annotation labeling.
  • The data annotation requester publishes images and videos on the platform, and the platform automatically labels, and then sends the lower recognition rate data to the workers to label.
  • It is a coursework for Software Engineering and Computing III. And I completed front-end and optimize the recognition algorithm.
